sentences.english: In the evening, I lazily walked on the streets of Magung City.
sentences.chinese: 晚间时分，我慵懒地在马公市的街头散步。

sentences.english: But the landlord had already accepted the proposal of the young master surnamed Ma, a son of a rich family.
sentences.chinese: 可祝员外早已把女儿许配给了有钱人家的少爷马公子。

sentences.english: Some woman still like makong their husbands and sons successful.
sentences.chinese: 有些女人还是喜欢马公她们的丈夫和儿子的成功。
